divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my back porch smoking a cigarette. i don't smoke inside the house so i step out every few hours to have one. i looked to the east and saw a golden lights coming towards my direction so i stepped out into the yard thinking i would get a better view than under the porch. my first thoughts were it was a large aircraft but then my mind quickly changed as the object came overhead. the altitude was so low i felt like i could reach out and touch it. there were at least 20 non blinking lights orange \ golden with red ones intermingled. the lights were in a rectangular pattern. i estimate the craft to be about a mile long. there was a low hum as it passed over head then nothing. it came into sight and departed over the horizon in less than a minute heading from east to west. my reaction was amazement. i've seen a lot of different type of aircraft but never anything that huge and quiet. i called a relative as soon as it flew over and let them know what i saw. i lost view of the object as it disappeared over the horizon.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Old Boston
This sighting has never been favorited.
